entry.title: Paper accepted in ARES ‘22
entry.content: Paper accepted in the 17th International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security (ARES 2022) entitled “HybridDAD: Detecting DDoS Flooding Attack using Machine Learning with Programmable Switches”.
entry.summary: Paper accepted in the 17th International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security (ARES 2022) entitled “HybridDAD: Detecting DDoS Flooding Attack using Machine Learning with Programmable Switches”.

entry.title: Paper accepted in Workshop on Cybersecurity and Social Sciences (CySSS)

link.title: Paper accepted in Workshop on Cybersecurity and Social Sciences (CySSS)

entry.content: Paper accepted by 1st International Workshop on Cybersecurity and Social Sciences (CySSS) entitled “A Novel Distributed Security Approach against ARP Cache Poisoning Attack”.
entry.summary: Paper accepted by 1st International Workshop on Cybersecurity and Social Sciences (CySSS) entitled “A Novel Distributed Security Approach against ARP Cache Poisoning Attack”.

entry.title: Paper accepted in Journal of IEEE Access

link.title: Paper accepted in Journal of IEEE Access

entry.content: Paper accepted by Journal of IEEE Access entitled “Combining cooperative with non-cooperative game theory to model Wi-Fi congestion in apartment blocks”.
entry.summary: Paper accepted by Journal of IEEE Access entitled “Combining cooperative with non-cooperative game theory to model Wi-Fi congestion in apartment blocks”.

entry.title: Paper accepted in Journal of Networking and Computer Applications (JNCA)

entry.content: Paper accepted by Journal of Networking and Computer Applications on permission analysis of health and fitness apps in IoT programming frameworks.
entry.summary: Paper accepted by Journal of Networking and Computer Applications on permission analysis of health and fitness apps in IoT programming frameworks.

entry.title: Talks at University of Tehran and Iran University of Science and Technology

link.title: Talks at University of Tehran and Iran University of Science and Technology

entry.content: Giving talks to presents the results of my research on IoT Security at Iran University of Science and Technology and University of Tehran.

entry.title: Paper accepted in 2019 Military Communications and Information Systems (MilCIS) Conference

entry.content: Paper accepted by MilCIS 2019 Conference on a system architecture for time-sensitive heterogeneous wireless distributed software-defined networks.
entry.summary: Paper accepted by MilCIS 2019 Conference on a system architecture for time-sensitive heterogeneous wireless distributed software-defined networks.

entry.title: Started a new role in UNSW Canberra

link.title: Started a new role in UNSW Canberra

entry.content: I started a new role in UNSW Canberra as postdoctoral reseach fellow at the School of Engineering and Information Technology (SEIT).
entry.summary: I started a new role in UNSW Canberra as postdoctoral reseach fellow at the School of Engineering and Information Technology (SEIT).

entry.title: PhD Degree awarded
entry.content: The degree of Doctor of Philosophy is awarded to me by UNSW Sydney, the Faculty of Engineering.
entry.summary: The degree of Doctor of Philosophy is awarded to me by UNSW Sydney, the Faculty of Engineering.

entry.title: Paper accepted in IEEE PerCom SPT-IoT workshop’19

link.title: Paper accepted in IEEE PerCom SPT-IoT workshop'19

entry.content: Paper accepted by IEEE PerCom SPT-IoT workshop’19 on IoT-NetSec: Policy-based IoT Network Security Using OpenFlow.
entry.summary: Paper accepted by IEEE PerCom SPT-IoT workshop’19 on IoT-NetSec: Policy-based IoT Network Security Using OpenFlow.

entry.title: Ph.D. Thesis submitted!
entry.content: I have submitted my Ph.D thesis titled “IoT: Security of Devices and User Data”. Currently, I am on job market looking for a pertinent academic position in cyber-physical security.
entry.summary: I have submitted my Ph.D thesis titled “IoT: Security of Devices and User Data”. Currently, I am on job market looking for a pertinent academic position in cyber-physical security.
